about_the_game:
Overview:
Arena Shooter Goes Third Person with CrossPlanet! With Classic PVP modes such as Team Deathmatch, Free for All, Capture the Flag, and more! And if PVP isn't your thing, then dive into some PVE content with a team of friends and take on waves on enemies as you defend objectives.

PvP Multiplayer:
Experience a new take on player vs player area shooter combat. We've got Team Deathmatch, Free for All, Capture, Snipers, Elimination, a bobble head mode and much more! All playable on multiple maps from small 2v2 arenas to large scale 8v8 battlefields suited for vehicular and air unit combat.



PvE Modes:
Want to grab a squad of friends and take on waves of increasingly difficult enemies? You can do that, hop into "Safeguard" where you and up to 3 friends will need to protect a generator from the enemies that swarm you. Or maybe you'd prefer taking on the task of fighting a huge creature? Tackle our boss battles in "Assault" where enemies have increased health and will test your skill to the highest level.

Player Customization:
A wide range of soldier customization ensures player expression. From armor collections, skins, and weapon paint, to player banners, emotes and vehicle coatings. CrossPlanet ensures you can create a unique set of cosmetics for your profile so you can stand out amongst the crowd and show off to the masses in online multiplayer. Obtain these through in-game cosmetic rewards, or the storefront.



Custom games:
Grab a group of friends, set up a lobby and create unique gametypes/ settings so that you can have hours of fun. Maybe you want a huge score to win such as 500, or for everyone to have bobble heads, or maybe it's 200% health modifiers and infinite ammo so that can you spray and pray!



Keyboard + Controller support:
CrossPlanet supports keyboard and mouse, along with both Xbox and Playstation gamepads, steam controller, and PC gamepads. No matter your input device, CrossPlanet is playable on your weapon of choice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X or Intel i7-9700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700 XT or Nvidia RTX 2070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space

short_description: Arena Shooter goes Third Person with CrossPlanet! Engage in a large range of Player vs Player experiences such as Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Conquest, Gun Game and more, on a large range of 15 diverse maps, plus vehicles and aircraft!
